In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the letter **Z** serves the following purposes:

- z represents a [zruty](/wiki/Zruty_\(monster_class\) "Zruty (monster class)"), which is a [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class") consisting only of the titular [zruty](/wiki/Zruty "Zruty").

* Z represents a [zombie](/wiki/Zombie_\(monster_class\) "Zombie (monster class)"):

  - Z [kobold zombie](/wiki/Kobold_zombie "Kobold zombie")
  - Z [gnome zombie](/wiki/Gnome_zombie "Gnome zombie")
  - Z [orc zombie](/wiki/Orc_zombie "Orc zombie")
  - Z [dwarf zombie](/wiki/Dwarf_zombie "Dwarf zombie")
  - Z [elf zombie](/wiki/Elf_zombie "Elf zombie")
  - Z [human zombie](/wiki/Human_zombie "Human zombie")
  - Z [ettin zombie](/wiki/Ettin_zombie "Ettin zombie")
  - Z [giant zombie](/wiki/Giant_zombie "Giant zombie")
  - Z [ghoul](/wiki/Ghoul "Ghoul")
  - Z [skeleton](/wiki/Skeleton "Skeleton")

- Press [z]() to [zap](/wiki/Zap "Zap") a wand.
- Press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [z]() to zap a [spell](/wiki/Spell "Spell") that you have learned.
- press [ctrl](/wiki/Ctrl "Ctrl") + [z]() to suspend NetHack if applicable - see [^Z](/wiki/%5EZ "^Z") for more details.

## Variants

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") replaces the zruty monster class with the [zouthern animals](/wiki/Zouthern_animal "Zouthern animal") for the z glyph, moving the zruty with the [apelike creatures](/wiki/Apelike_creature "Apelike creature"), and introduces new monsters that use the Z glyph:

- z "zouthern" animals:

  - z [echidna](/wiki/Echidna "Echidna")
  - z [platypus](/wiki/Platypus "Platypus")
  - z [koala](/wiki/Koala "Koala")
  - z [wombat](/wiki/Wombat "Wombat")
  - z [Tasmanian devil](/wiki/Tasmanian_devil "Tasmanian devil")
  - z [wallaby](/wiki/Wallaby "Wallaby")
  - z [wallaroo](/wiki/Wallaroo "Wallaroo")
  - z [kangaroo](/wiki/Kangaroo "Kangaroo")

- Z undead:

  - Z [ghoul mage](/wiki/Ghoul_mage "Ghoul mage")
  - Z [ghast](/wiki/Ghast "Ghast")
  - Z [ghoul queen](/wiki/Ghoul_queen "Ghoul queen")
  - Z [gug](/wiki/Gug "Gug")

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")

Z

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Printable ASCII characters
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + space
` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = { } |
Qq Ww Ee Rr Tt Yy Uu Ii Oo Pp : " [ ] \
Aa Ss Dd Ff Gg Hh Jj Kk Ll ? ; ' Ctrl
Zz Xx Cc Vv Bb Nn Mm , . / < > Alt

In NetHack, the letter Z serves the following purposes:

  • z represents a zruty, which is a monster class consisting only of the titular zruty.
  • Z represents a zombie:
    • Z kobold zombie
    • Z gnome zombie
    • Z orc zombie
    • Z dwarf zombie
    • Z elf zombie
    • Z human zombie
    • Z ettin zombie
    • Z giant zombie
    • Z ghoul
    • Z skeleton
  • Press z to zap a wand.
  • Press shift + z to zap a spell that you have learned.
  • press ctrl + z to suspend NetHack if applicable - see ^Z for more details.

Variants

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM replaces the zruty monster class with the zouthern animals for the z glyph, moving the zruty with the apelike creatures, and introduces new monsters that use the Z glyph:

  • z "zouthern" animals:
    • z echidna
    • z platypus
    • z koala
    • z wombat
    • z Tasmanian devil
    • z wallaby
    • z wallaroo
    • z kangaroo
  • Z undead:
    • Z ghoul mage
    • Z ghast
    • Z ghoul queen
    • Z gug
